title: At the concert on 10th anniversary of occupation of Crimea, Putin says that railway from Rostov to Mariupol and Berdyansk was...
content: At the concert on 10th anniversary of occupation of Crimea, Putin says that railway from Rostov to Mariupol and Berdyansk was restored, and plans to build this railway up to Sevastopol, as an alternative to Kerch bridge
author: Live UA Map
